name: Mountain
description: A towering mountain dominates the landscape, offering valuable resources like minerals and fresh water. The treacherous paths and extreme weather create natural barriers, while the thin air and cold temperatures can be deadly to unprepared travelers.
atmosphere: Giant mountain with cloud-hidden peak. Wind howls around peaks with eerie symphony. Distant rock falls and bird cries break silence. Sheer scale creates insignificance. Raw beauty inspires awe. Thin, crisp air scented of pine, stone, and snow.
